item.title: Introduction to Threat Modelling
item.description: This two hour Introduction to Threat Modelling workshop walks through the fundamental approaches to threat modelling - focused on the threat, the impact, or the vulnerability. Exercises take you through a method from each approach, illustrating how to begin using threat modelling to build security into your design at a fundamental level.

item.title: Secure by Scenario
item.description: This bespoke workshop involves initial consultation with your organisation to build out a tailored and realistic scenario. In a moderated workshop we will then work with groups of your people to run through the scenario in stages, establishing responses and communication flows, and helping you to prepare for the worst from every angle.

item.title: TM-002 Threat Modelling with the OWASP Top 10
item.description: Focusing on the details of the OWASP Top 10, the list of the most commonly exploited web application vulnerabilities published by OWASP, this workshop goes through how to take a vulnerability list and adapt it for use in fast, effective threat modelling during your web application design process.
